description: These laughing kaomojis have little hands grabbing onto them because they’re laughing so hard. They are grabbing their cheeks, lips, or just the side of their heads. Make hands using the character ૢ . It even looks like a little tiny heart.  (⌯꒪͒ ૢ∀ ૢ꒪͒) ੭ੇ (⌯˃̶᷄ ᴗ̂ ॣ˂̶᷄⌯ั) (˃̴̀ᄇॢ˂̴́ ∗) ᵵ (ૢ˃ꌂ˂⁎)Շ^ ✬̴⃛꒰⁍̴ꈊ ॢ⁍̴⌯꒱ (˃ॢ੪˂ू॓๑)‾̞̭̭ ⁽⁽꒰๑•‧̮ૣ•ૣ๑꒱⁾⁾ (๑˃̶᷇⺫ॢ˂̶᷆๑) (⌯꒪͒ ૢ◞◟ ૢ꒪͒) ꉂ (˃̶᷄‧̫ॢ ˂̶᷅๑ ) Words and Sounds Ha Ha Ha or Ho Ho Ho are pretty common ways to express the sound of laughing. These text faces all have these sounds somehow incorporated into them. The text is always fancy letters, as English letters don’t look all that funny. Be sure to use laughing mouths that are all open, like ꇴ, ∀, and ᗢ. ꉂ (ᵔ̴̶̤᷄ꇴ ॣᵔ̴̶̤᷅⌯))л̵ʱªʱª⁎*.＊ Σ(꒪ॢ∀꒪;)՞л̵ʱªʱª ꉂ ꀞꀞꀞ(ᕑᗢूᓫ∗)˒˒ ꉂ (๑¯ਊ¯)σ л̵ʱªʱªʱª ʱªʱªʱª (ᕑᗢूᓫ∗) (๑ॢ˃̶͈̀ ꇴ ˂̶͈́๑ॢ) л̵ʱªʱªʱª ｰΣ(꒪ॢ∀꒪;)՞л̵ʱªʱª (˃̴̀ᄇॢ˂̴́ ∗)੭᷅ʊʊ (‾͈̑ ◟  ॢ‾͈̑๑)ഽ̵ᵘഽ̵ᵘ४꒰ ꒱ (๑ ˃̵͈́∀˂̵͈̀ )ʊʊ ꉂ (ᵔ̴̶̤᷄ꇴ ॣᵔ̴̶̤᷅⌯))л̵ʱªʱª⁎*.＊
title: Little Hands
